name: Ekincare
description: Ekincare includes annual health checkups (AHC), telemedicine (online doctor consultations), e-pharmacy (order medicines online), vaccinations, mental health and well-being services, access to fitness centers and more.
features: Prime Cover: Service surety for higher employee engagement and holistic health benefits
Flexi Cover: More savings with higher employee engagement and limitless options
Headline: A full stack health benefits platform that is predictive, preventive and personalized
ShortDescription: New age health benefits for the new normal

Highlights.name: OPD benefits
Highlights.description: Provide health checks, telemedicine, pharmacy delivery, fitness sessions, dental/vision services on a single platform

Highlights.name: Medical Rooms
Highlights.description: Focus on your core business while ekincare manages the day-to-day processes of your Occupational Health Centers (OHCs)

Highlights.name: Healthcare financing
Highlights.description: Provide cashless and easy zero-interest EMIs to employees on big-ticket healthcare procedures

Highlights.name: Mental health
Highlights.description: Ensure your employees are happy and productive with employee assistance programs and counsellor support

enhanced_description: Ekincare, launched in 2015 and headquartered in Hyderabad, Telangana, is described as a full-stack health benefits platform that is predictive, preventive, and personalized. It aims to provide new-age health benefits for the new normal, encompassing a wide range of services. These include annual health checkups (AHC), telemedicine for online doctor consultations, an e-pharmacy for ordering medicines, vaccinations, mental health and well-being services, and access to fitness centers. The platform consolidates OPD benefits like health checks, pharmacy delivery, fitness sessions, and dental/vision services onto a single platform. Ekincare also offers management for Occupational Health Centers (OHCs) through its Medical Rooms service and provides healthcare financing options, such as cashless and zero-interest EMIs for employees on significant healthcare procedures. Additionally, it supports employee mental well-being through employee assistance programs and counsellor support.
key_use_cases: Administering comprehensive employee health and well-being benefits
Improving employee happiness and engagement through health initiatives
Providing remote and in-person healthcare access for employees (telemedicine, health checks, OHCs)
Facilitating access to e-pharmacy and vaccination services
Supporting employee mental health through assistance programs and counselling
Offering flexible healthcare financing options to employees
Streamlining and consolidating diverse health services on a single platform
competitive_advantages: Positioned as a full-stack, predictive, preventive, and personalized health benefits platform
Offers a comprehensive suite of health services on a single platform (e.g., health checks, telemedicine, pharmacy, fitness, dental/vision)
Provides a unique service for managing Occupational Health Centers (OHCs) for businesses
Includes innovative healthcare financing options like cashless and zero-interest EMIs for employees
Features 'Prime Cover' for service surety and holistic health benefits, enhancing employee engagement
Offers 'Flexi Cover' promising more savings and limitless options for higher employee engagement
roi_benefits: Potential for higher employee productivity through enhanced well-being
Opportunity for cost savings in benefits administration and utilization (via 'Flexi Cover')
Reduced administrative burden for managing diverse health benefits by centralizing services
Alleviated financial stress for employees regarding high-cost healthcare procedures through financing options
Optimized management of Occupational Health Centers, allowing businesses to focus on core operations
primary_users: HR professionals (for managing benefits and wellness programs)
Employees (for accessing health services and benefits)
Occupational Health Center (OHC) staff/management (if utilizing Ekincare's OHC management services)
